stories.text: Is it possible these days to send emails from my backend server directly? I am worried about that the emails would not get through to the receiver. My use case would be to maintain my mailing list without having to share all emails with a service like mailchimp, which could be an issue due to gdpr.
stories.title: Is there a way to send to a mailing list from my own server?

stories.text:
We started playWhiteLabel.com a few weeks ago. Matt from Torro Media reached out to make a branded game for his media agency. We changed road side banners to show brand related messages and added lead forms.

Play drive.torro.io
stories.title: We branded a game for Torro Media
